Package imp.core.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDataSource
    Data holder for GL objects
    AbstractGLObject
    An object that is drawn using OpenGL
    AbstractGraphics
    This class is meant to define the graphics engine of the IMP program such that low end graphics calls are abstracted away from higher level design
    AbstractModelView
    Abstract class which defines how a GLCanvas can be used to view a set of GLObjects
    AxisObject
    This class is responsible for displaying the axis for a mechanical linkage
    Camera
    Defines the view of the user as a camera that the user sees through
    GLModel
    Object used to draw data held by .OBJ files to the GLCanvas
    LoopDataSource Deprecated
    LoopObject
    Defines how an IMP Loop is displayed to the GL Canvas
    Mat4
    A very lightweight 4x4 matrix class that uses a primitive float array for easy interfacing with the JOGL wrapper.
    Material
    This class acts as a data structure used to represent a material.
    MockCamera
    A mock camera for testing the graphics
    MockDrawable
    Mock drawable for testing the graphics
    MockGL
    Mock openGL for testing the graphics
    ModelDataSource
    This class handles the different model objects to display from the command holder
    ModelView
    Rough implementation of AbstractModelView to be used as an example for future implementations See RunImp1() for comments on usage
    ModelViewTestVersion
    This class is a concrete version of an AbstractModelView that can be used for testing purposes.
    Quaternion Deprecated
    Shader
    Compiler for GLSL shader programs.
    TestAbstractGraphics
    This class will test the abstract methods in a concrete implementation of an AbstratGraphics object
    TestAbstractModelView
    This class tests the AbstractModelView class.
    TestAxisObject
    Test for the axis object to make sure everything runs smoothly
    TestCamera  
    TestDataSource
    Test class to test the functionality of the AbstractDataSource
    TestGLModel
    Tests the GLModel to make sure everything runs smoothly
    TestLoopObject
    This class will test the LoopObject class and verify that it functions properly.
    TestMat4
    Class or testing the unctionality o the Mat4 class
    TestMaterial
    This class is used to test the functionality of the Material class.
    TestModelDataSource
    Tests the ModelDataSource to make sure everything runs smoothly
    TestShader  
    TestTexturedGLModel
    This test will test the textured glModel object
    TestVec3
    Tests the functionality of the Vec3 class
    TestVec4
    Tests the functionality of the Vec4 class
    TexturedGLModel
    This class is used to draw models that are textured.
    Vec2
    Used to hold two components
    Vec3
    This class represents a 3 dimensional vector
    Vec4
    Light weight 4 dimensional vector.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractGLObject.DATA_TYPE  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateNameException
    Exception thrown when an object that requires unique names has a duplicate name
